resources.string: Thanks for playing Collisions! When you start a new game, youll see a bunch of 3D spheres bouncing around the screen. When you tap the screen with your finger(s) it will create a sphere where you tap that will expand and collide with any sphere that hits it. All spheres that hit it will also expand and gain the ability to be collided by more spheres. This should cause a chain reaction that pops spheres. The goal is to pop as many spheres as possible with as few clicks as possible. Each sphere popped will add 1 point to your score and each tap will subtract 5 from your score, so choose where you tap wisely! This single player game implements 2 different game modes: custom and normal. In custom you get to set your own values for the game, and in normal there are three different difficulties (Easy, Medium, and Hard). Good luck!
